div.div: Meta-analysis of static productivity residuals across fish stocks.
div.p: Shown are the estimated autoregressive parameter α ( a, b) and stochastic trend parameter δ ( c, d) fitted to the biomass residuals of the static Graham–Schaefer model for all 276 stocks ( a, c) and those stocks depleted below B MSY ( b, d). The horizontal lines in a, b represent the 95% credible intervals, with red lines representing cases that do not overlap zero. Plotting of credible intervals is suppressed for c, d for presentation purposes.
